events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully with our hiring manager in software development.
Thank you for your prompt response and your enthusiasm about the Senior Software Engineer role.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 10:00 AM UTC.
You have successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong software development skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit with company culture and employment terms.
Your HR interview was completed and the feedback was very positive regarding your communication and cultural fit.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Senior Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
You have provided positive feedback on the offered terms and expressed excitement about joining the team.
You have officially accepted our offer to join the company as a Senior Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including equipment setup and first-day orientation scheduling.
The hiring process for the Senior Software Engineer role is now complete; we welcome you onboard officially.
